text: The Mangystau Campaign was a military operation launched by the ruler of the Khwarazm State, Ala ad-Din Muhammad, in 1210 to the Mangystau Region. ==Campaign== Jand and Mangystau, which served as important winter quarters for the Kipchaks, launched a great expedition.https://dergipark.org.tr/tr/download/article-file/1206086 The aim of this expedition was to suppress the unrest in the Mangystau Region located east of the Caspian Sea and to take control of the Turkmen tribes in the region. As a result of the expedition, order was established in the region and the Turkmen tribes were removed from the region.https://acikbilim.yok.gov.tr/bitstream/handle/20.500.12812/125345/yokAcikBilim_10205053.pdf?isAllowed=y&sequence; == References ==
title: Mangystau Campaign (1210)
